activities: We will be working with organizations with respect to any and all aspects of their Human Resources Information Systems.  Occasionally in order to find, implement and enhance an organization's Human Resource system, we need to be privy to confidential information.  This information is necessary in order to create an HR system that is maximally beneficial to our clients.  We use this personal information for the sole purpose of finding, implementing and enhancing their Human Resource systems.
eucountries: France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization data, client data, customer data, visitor data, manually processed data
